attributes.action: ISPs should charge per Mbps i.e. 2mbps =£2 per month, 38mbps = £38 per month...
attributes.background: People of the UK are being ripped off for their broadband. We are held to ransom by the monopoly held by BT Openreach. Why should we pay £30+ for standard broadband on 2mbps when people on fibre pay the same for 38 mbps? It would force BT Openreach to invest in doing some infrastructure work!

rejection.details: This petition is calling on ISPs, not the Government or Parliament, to take action.
